alert.note: Alert for South Washington Cascade Foothills (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 03 at 2:33PM PST until January 04 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST TUESDAY ABOVE 1500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow above 1500 feet, with patchy light freezing rain. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches, with light ice accumulations possible. * WHERE...South Washington Cascade Foothills. * WHEN...Until 6 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Drivers should be prepared for icy or snow covered roads and very dangerous winter like driving conditions. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
